item.text: Has the patient performed health screening before?
Does the patient have any family history?
Does the patient have any medical history?
In the past 2 weeks, how often does this patient:
Trouble falling asleep/staying asleep or sleeping too much
Felt tired or having little energy
Had poor appetite or over eating
Felt bad about himself/herself, felt like a failure or he/she has let his/her family down
Trouble concentrating (e.g. watching television or reading newspaper)
Moved slowly or fidgeted excessively that is noticeable by people around him/her
Had thoughts that he/she would be better dead, or hurting yourself
In the last 2 weeks, indicate how difficult these problems made it for this patient
Do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with others
How often do you consume alcohol?
How many alcoholic beverages do you consume in a day?
How often within the last year,
Do you consume 6 or more drink in a day?
Were you not able to stop drinking once started?
Were you not able to perform normal activities due to drinking?
You needed to drink first thing in the morning to get going after a heavy drinking session?
That you felt guilt or remorse after drinking?
Were you unable to remember what happened the night before due to drinking?
Have you or someone else been injured because of your drinking?
Has a relative, friend, doctor, been concerned about your drinking habits?

Point of Care Testing: Blood Cholesterol
